data.actual_result: Bob sees the group name has changed to "Unnamed". Green button still works. This works on two computers, two accounts. It should be supported.
data.expected_result: Bob sees the same name he sees before joining and getting kicked and a green join button.
data.short_description: Removing someone from a group DM causes the removed user's link title to become "Unnamed".
data.steps_to_repro: - Get a invite to DM link. - Send the link to a friend (Bob). - Bob joins with the link. Tell Bob to keep looking at the chat room. - After Bob has joined, remove him from group.
